720541f-c.text:
Hudson Street, east side, from Clarkson to Leroy Sts., ahowing the old St. Johns Burying Ground. This later became Hudson Park. View 2 shows the far corner at Leroy Street. No. 3 is a modern view showing the foreground corner after
the Park was developed here.
No's.1-2: 1898
3:Sept. 4, 1938
J. J. Corell, phoko
P. L. Sperr Collection
P. L. Sperr
720541f-c.folder: Hudson Street & Clarkson Street, Manhattan, NY
